overview: John Holmes is dictating his memoirs on the terrace of a penthouse in New York City.  He has just left sunny California and all the wild orgies.  He is desperately searching for the one woman who can deep throat his massive manhood.  He's looking for...The New York City Woman.
tagline: Who is....... The New York City Woman... ? Is it: ...Georgina Spelvin? ....C.J. Laing? Johnny The Wadd Holmes is going to find out... or die trying!!
title: The New York City Woman
